title: [Mod] 大家有大神打上了暮色森林么1.2.5的？？
author: 亟兮
txt_content:
从索引贴下的 几个基础的mod 然后再打暮色森林 崩溃了  就是把暮色森林那个zip直接丢进 mods文件夹下呀 为什么这样都能崩溃 其他没什么mod的啊 冲突不可能啊 询问了好久了 希望有大神能解答下 以下崩溃码：
4 mods loaded
Minecraft Forge 3.2.4.114
FML v2.1.28.95
Forge Mod Loader version 2.1.28.95 for Minecraft 1.2.5
 mod_ModLoaderMp : Pre-initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_MinecraftForge : Pre-initialized (minecraft.jar)
 mod_ReiMinimap : Pre-initialized ([1.2.4&1.25]ReiMinimap_v3.0_04汉化版by大刘.zip)
 mod_TwilightForest : Loaded (twilightforest-1.8.0.zip)

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.


--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 5b4b8294 --------
Generated 12-6-29 下午12:15
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
Java: 1.7.0_06-ea, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: Intel(R) HD Graphics Family version 3.0.0 - Build 8.15.10.2266, Intel
cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.IllegalAccessException: Class cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer can not access a member of class mod_TwilightForest with modifiers ""
 at cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer.preInit(ModLoaderModContainer.java:109)
 at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.preModInit(Loader.java:233)

 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(Minecraft.java:383)

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalAccessException: Class cpw.mods.fml.common.modloader.ModLoaderModContainer can not access a member of class mod_TwilightForest with modifiers ""

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
其一，1.8.0版本是1.2.5上最旧的版本，和FML的兼容性应该是差的一塌糊涂，都提示mod语法错误了。。。所以目前的客户端必须放弃，重新整合（或者）。必须改用modloader，forge版本请选用比较低的版本如90、98

其二，对于twilightforest-1.10.1之前的版本，需要装进minecraft.jar里，放mods文件夹是不行的。

其三，为了方便，我建议你直接无视我说的以上两点，删了twilightforest-1.8.0.zip，干脆用最新的twilightforest-1.10.1.zip，放进mods文件夹就完事儿了。

replies.author: 亟兮
replies.txt_content: ball ball you 来个大神给我指点一下吧
